meanings.definition: The Scottish word for New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent1: We always have a big dinner on hogmenay.
meanings.sent2: Everyone in the town gathers for the hogmenay fireworks.
meanings.sent3: The children were excited to stay up late for hogmenay.
meanings.sent4: The streets were filled with laughter and joy on hogmenay.
meanings.sent5: The bells rang out to welcome hogmenay with cheer.

meanings.definition: A celebration or party held on New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent1: Our neighbors hosted a lively hogmenay party.
meanings.sent2: The hogmenay festivities lasted until the early hours.
meanings.sent3: The hogmenay decorations were colorful and bright.
meanings.sent4: Everyone danced and sang at the hogmenay celebration.
meanings.sent5: The hogmenay countdown filled the room with excitement.
